Name: Arctic Warfare Weapons
Description:
Ever wanted more Arctic Warfare weapons in-game? No? Well I do!
This mod includes the following weapons:

- AWP (Black)
- AWP (White)
- AWP (Green)

- AWS (White)
- AWS (Black)

(Marked under Arctic Warfare in Bolt Action Rifles)


PLEASE NOTE:
Muzzle Bipods can be attached to the mount underneath the barrels of AWP rifles. Doing so causes the gun's muzzle to change its location to the mount, so for accurate shooting place the attachment marked, "Muzzle Fixer" on the muzzle of the AWP after placing the bipod on.

This is my first mod.
